00093 #define LLP_CONNECTION_REQUEST_MAX_LENGTH                                                       \
00094                 (3 * sizeof(u_char) + sizeof(u_short) + 3 *                                     \
00095                 LLP_FUNCTION_LIST_MAX_LENGTH + LLP_H_LENGTH)
00096

00101                 (2 * sizeof(u_char) + 3 * LLP_FUNCTION_LIST_MAX_LENGTH +        \
00102                 LLP_H_LENGTH + LLP_Y_LENGTH)
00103                 
00107 #define LLP_KEY_EXCHANGE_MAX_LENGTH (sizeof(u_char) + LLP_Y_LENGTH)

00123 typedef struct {
00125         u_char major_version;
00127         u_char minor_version;
00129         u_char session;                 
00131         char ciphers[LLP_FUNCTION_LIST_MAX_LENGTH];     
00133         char hashes[LLP_FUNCTION_LIST_MAX_LENGTH];
00135         char macs[LLP_FUNCTION_LIST_MAX_LENGTH];
00137         u_char h[LLP_H_LENGTH];
00138 } llp_connection_request_p;
00139 
00143 typedef struct {
00145         u_char session_dst;
00147         u_char session_src;
00149         char cipher[LLP_FUNCTION_NAME_MAX_LENGTH];
00151         char hash[LLP_FUNCTION_NAME_MAX_LENGTH];
00153         char mac[LLP_FUNCTION_NAME_MAX_LENGTH];
00155         u_char h[LLP_H_LENGTH];
00157         u_char y[LLP_Y_LENGTH];
00158 } llp_connection_ok_packet_p;
